marker.ph:
<<ScrollViewer> <StackPanel>
<Label Height="27" Content="1)Введите Имя читателя" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="320" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> <TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <TextBox x:Name="FirstName" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" /> </TextBlock>
<Label Height="27" Content="2)Введите Фамилию читателя" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="320" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> <TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <TextBox x:Name="SecondName" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" /> </TextBlock>
<Label Height="27" Content="3)Введите id группы читателей" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="320" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> <TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <TextBox x:Name="ReadersId" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" /> </TextBlock>
<Button Name="Add" Click="AddTicket" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Добавить" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" />
<Label Height="27" Content="Удалить читателя по Id" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="350" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> <TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <TextBox x:Name="TicketId" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" /> <Button Name="RemoveTicket" Click="RemoteTicket" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Удалить" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> </TextBlock>
<Button Name="PrintAll" Click="PrintAllReaders" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Вывести всех читателей" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" />
<Label Name="Result" Height="27" Content="Все читатели" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="350" /> <DataGrid x:Name="Grid" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Height="251" Margin="23,23,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Bottom" Width="455" CellEditEnding="Grid_OnCellEditEnding" /> </StackPanel> </ScrollViewer>.../>

<<StackPanel>
<Label Height="27" Content="1)Введите Имя читателя" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="320" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> <TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <TextBox x:Name="FirstName" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" /> </TextBlock>
<Label Height="27" Content="2)Введите Фамилию читателя" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="320" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> <TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <TextBox x:Name="SecondName" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" /> </TextBlock>
<Label Height="27" Content="3)Введите id группы читателей" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="320" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> <TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <TextBox x:Name="ReadersId" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" /> </TextBlock>
<Button Name="Add" Click="AddTicket" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Добавить" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" />
<Label Height="27" Content="Удалить читателя по Id" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="350" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> <TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <TextBox x:Name="TicketId" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" /> <Button Name="RemoveTicket" Click="RemoteTicket" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Удалить" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> </TextBlock>
<Button Name="PrintAll" Click="PrintAllReaders" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Вывести всех читателей" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" />
<Label Name="Result" Height="27" Content="Все читатели" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="350" /> <DataGrid x:Name="Grid" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Height="251" Margin="23,23,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Bottom" Width="455" CellEditEnding="Grid_OnCellEditEnding" /> </StackPanel>.../>

<<Label Height="27" Content="1)Введите Имя читателя" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="320" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> <TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <TextBox x:Name="FirstName" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" /> </TextBlock> <Label Height="27" Content="2)Введите Фамилию читателя" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="320" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> <TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <TextBox x:Name="SecondName" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" /> </TextBlock> <Label Height="27" Content="3)Введите id группы читателей" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="320" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> <TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <TextBox x:Name="ReadersId" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" /> </TextBlock> <Button Name="Add" Click="AddTicket" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Добавить" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> <Label Height="27" Content="Удалить читателя по Id" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="350" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> <TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <TextBox x:Name="TicketId" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" /> <Button Name="RemoveTicket" Click="RemoteTicket" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Удалить" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> </TextBlock> <Button Name="PrintAll" Click="PrintAllReaders" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Вывести всех читателей" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> <Label Name="Result" Height="27" Content="Все читатели" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="350" /> <DataGrid x:Name="Grid" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Height="251" Margin="23,23,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Bottom" Width="455" CellEditEnding="Grid_OnCellEditEnding" />.../>
<<TextBox x:Name="FirstName" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" />.../>
<<TextBox x:Name="SecondName" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" />.../>
<<TextBox x:Name="ReadersId" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" />.../>

<<TextBox x:Name="TicketId" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" /> <Button Name="RemoveTicket" Click="RemoteTicket" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Удалить" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" />.../>

<<ScrollViewer> <StackPanel>
<Button Name="Tickets" Click="ShowTickets" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Читатели" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" />
<Label Height="27" Content="1)Вывести всех школьников из определённого класса" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="320" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <TextBox x:Name="NumberOfClass" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" /> <Button Name="FirstRequest" Click="PrintSchoolchildByClass" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Найти" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> </TextBlock>
<Label Height="27" Content="2)Вывести работников с опрделённой работы" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="300" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <TextBox x:Name="WorkPlace" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" /> <Button Name="SecondRequest" Click="PrintWorkerByWorkPlace" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Найти" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> </TextBlock>
<Label Height="27" Content="3)Вывести учителей с опрделённого университета" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="300" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <TextBox x:Name="NameOfUniversity" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" /> <Button Name="ThirdRequest" Click="PrintTeacherByUniversity" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Найти" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> </TextBlock>
<Label Height="27" Content="4)Вывести пенсионера с определённым номером пенсионного" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="370" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <TextBox x:Name="NumberOfPensionDocument" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" /> <Button Name="FourRequest" Click="PrintPensionerByNumberOfPensionDocument" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Найти" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> </TextBlock>
<Label Height="27" Content="5)Вывести студентов из определённого университета" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="350" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <TextBox x:Name="NameOfUniversityByStudent" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" /> <Button Name="FiveRequest" Click="PrintStudentByUniversity" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Найти" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> </TextBlock>
<Label Height="27" Content="6)Вывести читателей данной книги" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="350" /> <TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap" HorizontalAlignment="Left"> <TextBox x:Name="NameOfBook" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" /> <Button Name="SixRequest" Click="PrintPeopleByReadingProduct" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Найти" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> </TextBlock>
<Label Height="27" Content="7)Вывести читателей в промежуток времени" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="350" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <DatePicker Name="datePicker1" IsDropDownOpen="False" /> <DatePicker Name="datePicker2" IsDropDownOpen="False" /> <Button Name="SevenRequest" Click="PrintPeopleByReadingProductOnTime" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Найти" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> </TextBlock>
<TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <Label Height="27" Content="8)Вывести Самую популярную книгу" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="250" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <Button Name="EightRequest" Click="PrintMostPopularProduct" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Найти" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> </TextBlock>
<Label Height="27" Content="9)Вывести Работников библиотеки" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="350" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <TextBox x:Name="IdLibrary" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" /> <Button Name="NineRequest" Click="PrintWorkerLibraryByLibrary" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Найти" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> </TextBlock>
<TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <Label Height="27" Content="10)Вывести должников" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="150" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <Button Name="TenRequest" Click="PrintOverdueReader" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Найти" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> </TextBlock>
<Label Height="27" Content="11)Вывести Работников библиотеки" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="350" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <TextBox x:Name="NumberOfShelving" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" /> <Button Name="EleventhRequest" Click="PrintProductByLocation" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Найти" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> </TextBlock>
<Label Height="27" Content="12)Вывести читателей обслуженных библиотекарем" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="350" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <TextBox x:Name="LibraryWorkerId" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" /> <Button Name="TwelvRequest" Click="PrintPeopleServicedByLibraryWorker" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Найти" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> </TextBlock>
<Label Height="27" Content="13)Вывести все произведения автора" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="350" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <TextBox x:Name="AuthorId" Width="400" RenderTransformOrigin="0,0" Height="22" /> <Button Name="ThreeteenRequest" Click="PrintProductByAuthor" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Найти" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> </TextBlock>
<Label Height="27" Content="14)Количество обслуженных читателей в определённый промежуток времени" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="350" HorizontalAlignment="Left"/> <TextBlock TextWrapping="Wrap"> <DatePicker Name="datePicker3" IsDropDownOpen="False" /> <DatePicker Name="datePicker4" IsDropDownOpen="False" /> <Button Name="FourTeenRequest" Click="PrintCountPeopleServicedByLibraryWorker" Visibility="Visible" IsEnabled="True" Content="Найти" Width="80" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Left" /> </TextBlock>
<Label Name="Result" Height="27" Content="Результат запроса" RenderTransformOrigin="1,0" Width="350" /> <DataGrid x:Name="grid" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Height="251" Margin="23,23,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Bottom" Width="455" />
</StackPanel> </ScrollViewer>.../>
